00024 #include "SampleDatum.hpp"
00025 #include "util/unit.hpp"
00026 #include <iostream>
00027 #include <vector>
00028 #include <iterator>
00029 #include <complex>
00030 
00031 
00032 using namespace pwiz::util;
00033 using namespace pwiz::data;
00034 using namespace std; 
00035 
00036 
00037 ostream* os_ = 0;
00038 
00039 
00040 template <typename abscissa_type, typename ordinate_type>
00041 void test()
00042 {
00043     typedef SampleDatum<abscissa_type,ordinate_type> sd_type;
00044 
00045     vector<sd_type> v;
00046     v.push_back(sd_type(1,2));
00047     v.push_back(sd_type(3,4));
00048     v.push_back(sd_type(5,6));
00049 
00050     // write the pairs out to a stream
00051     ostringstream oss;
00052     copy(v.begin(), v.end(), ostream_iterator<sd_type>(oss, "\n"));
00053     if (os_) *os_ << oss.str();
00054 
00055     // read them back in 
00056     vector<sd_type> w;
00057     istringstream iss(oss.str());
00058     copy(istream_iterator<sd_type>(iss), istream_iterator<sd_type>(), back_inserter(w)); 
00059 
00060     // compare the two vectors
00061     unit_assert(v == w);
00062 }
00063 
00064 
00065 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00066 {
00067     try
00068     {
00069         if (argc>1 && !strcmp(argv[1],"-v")) os_ = &cout;
00070         if (os_) *os_ << "SampleDatumTest\n";
00071 
00072         test<int,int>();
00073         test<double,double>();
00074         test< double,complex<double> >();
00075         test< complex<double>,complex<double> >();
00076 
00077         return 0;
00078     }
00079     catch (exception& e)
00080     {
00081         cerr << e.what() << endl;
00082     }
00083     catch (...)
00084     {
00085         cerr << "Unknown exception.\n";
00086     }
00087 
00088     return 1; 
00089 }
